testcase.name: Create vCard Fail
testcase.system-out: Given I start the application...............................................passed And I dont have a vCard associated..........................................passed And I dont insert my credencials............................................passed When I tap the "create vCard" button........................................passed Then I can see "empty fields" message.......................................passed

testcase.name: Create vCard Fail(Phone number already exists)
testcase.system-out: Given I start the application...............................................passed And I dont have a vCard associated..........................................passed And I insert an phone number that already has card..........................passed When I tap the "create vCard" button........................................passed Then I can see "Phone number already exists" message error..................passed

testcase.name: Create vCard Successfully
testcase.system-out: Given I start the application...............................................passed And I dont have a vCard associated..........................................passed And I insert my credencials.................................................passed When I tap the "create vCard" button........................................passed Then I can see "vCard created" message.....................................passed

testcase.name: Login Fail
testcase.system-out: Given I start the application...............................................passed And I have a vCard associated...............................................passed And I insert the wrong "pin code"...........................................passed When I tap "Login" button...................................................passed Then I can see "Pin code error" message...................................passed
